scripts.prepare:mainnet: mustache config/mainnet.json tmpl/subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/mainnet.json tmpl/constants.ts > src/contants.ts
scripts.deploy:mainnet: npm run prepare:mainnet && graph deploy --debug --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ itsib/limit-trading
scripts.deploy:matic: npm run prepare:matic && graph deploy --debug --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/  itsib/limit-trading-matic
scripts.deploy:kovan: npm run prepare:kovan && graph deploy --debug --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ itsib/limit-trading-kovan
